title: Salesforce
description: Customer relationship management (CRM) software & cloud computing from the leader in CRM solutions for businesses large & small.

SALESFORCE_API_VERSION.description: Salesforce API version to use for non deprecated methods. Default 45.0

queryTrigger.title: Query
queryTrigger.description: Will continuously run the same SOQL Query and emit results one-by-one

entry.title: Get New and Updated Objects Polling
entry.description: Will poll for existing and updated objects where you can select any custom or build-in object for your Salesforce instance

startTime.label: Start Time
startTime.note: Indicates the beginning time to start polling from, default 1970-01-01T00:00:00.000Z

endTime.label: End Time
endTime.note: If provided, do not fetch records modified after this time (defaults to never)

sizeOfPollingPage.label: Size of Polling Page
sizeOfPollingPage.note: Please set the size of pages to be fetched (defaults to 1000). Please enter positive integer only, max 10000 objects

streamPlatformEvents.title: Subscribe to platform events (REALTIME FLOWS ONLY)
streamPlatformEvents.description: Can be used for subscription to the specified in the configuration Platform Event object. Can be used only for Realtime flows

newCase.title: New Case
newCase.description: Trigger is deprecated. You can use Get New and Updated Objects Polling action instead.

queryAction.title: Query
queryAction.description: Executing an SOQL Query that may return many objects. Each resulting object is emitted one-by-one

batchSize.label: Optional batch size
batchSize.note: A positive integer specifying batch size. If no batch size is specified then results of the query will be emitted one-by-one, otherwise query results will be emitted in array of maximum batch size.

allowResultAsSet.label: Allow all results to be returned in a set (overwrites 'Optional batch size feature')

extIdField.label: Optional Upsert field
extIdField.note: Please make sure selected SObject has this field and it is marked as 'External ID'

lookupObject.title: Lookup Object (at most 1)
lookupObject.description: Lookup object (at most 1) by selected field

lookupField.label: Lookup by field
lookupField.note: Please select the field which you want to use for lookup
